Package com.example.home_page

package com.example.home_page
  • Class
    Description
    annotateDetailsActivity
    This class adds functionality to the layout, manages file downloads, handle WebSocket communications in reference to annotations, and process user interactions with annotations.
    announceDetailsActivity
    This class adds functionality to the General Announcement page, allowing users to view announcement details when a button is pressed on the general page.
    ChatActivity
    ChatActivity provides a chat interface where users can send and receive messages via WebSocket.
    chatWebSocketListener
     
    chatWebSocketManager
    Manages WebSocket connections for chat functionality.
    classLib
    Activity class that displays a list of classes fetched from a remote server.
    classNews
    Activity class that displays news related to classes.
    classRepoActivity
    This class adds functionality to the Class Repo layout, allowing users to view class files as they dynamically appear.
    createAnnounceActivity
    This class allows users to create Announcements, using text field such as: The abstract title, and the body containing descriptive information.
    createClassActivity
    This class add functionality to the create class layout.
    deleteClassActivity
     
    fileRepoActivity
    Activity creates a file repo, a collection of files that users can access further given they select a file.
    FindClassActivity
    Activity to search and display class information.
    genAnnounceActivity
    Activity gives users a view of all the announcements, while giving the option of selecting announcements to view further details.
    home_classes
    The home_classes activity provides options for managing classes and viewing announcements.
    loginAcivity
    The loginActivity class handles user login, credential storage, and data retrieval.
    mainActivity
    The mainActivity class serves as the entry point of the app, providing options for login and sign-up.
    mainChatActivity
    The mainChatActivity class provides a UI for connecting to a chat server via WebSocket.
    personalFileRepoActivity
    The personalFileRepoActivity class provides an interface for viewing files related to a specific person.
    settings
    The settings class provides an interface for users to view and modify their settings.
    SignUpActivity
    The SignUpActivity class provides an interface for new users to sign up, return to the home screen, or delete an existing account.
    statsActivity
    Class gives users an update on their status, on how many files uploaded and annotations made Provides functionality for navigation back to the home screen.
    updateAnnounceActivity
    Activity allows users to update an existing announcement text, given that it needs a slight update, users can submit changes via a PUT request.
    uploadActivity
    Class gives users access to uploading files given the needed information: the Course Abbreviation and number, followed by file.type
    userPage
    The userPage class represents the main user interface after login, allowing navigation to settings, class library, personal file repository, home, and class news.
    VolleyMultipartRequest
     
    VolleySingleton
